verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> came בִּשְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> Now it came to pass in the thirtieth שָׁנָ֗ה <S%H8141><s%> year בָּֽרְבִיעִי֙ <S%H7243><s%> in the fourth בַּחֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H2568><s%> [month] in the fifth לַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> [day] of the month וַאֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I בְתֽוֹךְ־ <S%H8432><s%> as I [was] among הַגּוֹלָ֖ה <S%H1473><s%> the captives עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> was by נְהַר־ <S%H5104><s%> by the river כְּבָ֑ר <S%H3529><s%> of Chebar נִפְתְּחוּ֙ <S%H6605><s%> were opened הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> [that] the heavens וָאֶרְאֶ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> and I saw מַרְא֥וֹת <S%H4759><s%> visions אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God

בַּחֲמִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H2568><s%> In the fifth לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> [day] of the month הִ֚יא <S%H1931><s%> he הַשָּׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> year הַחֲמִישִׁ֔ית <S%H2549><s%> which [was] the fifth לְגָל֖וּת <S%H1546><s%> captivity הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of king יוֹיָכִֽין׃ <S%H3112><s%> Jehoiachin's

הָיֹ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> came הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> expressly דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> The word יְ֠הוָה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְחֶזְקֵ֨אל <S%H3168><s%> came expressly unto Ezekiel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בּוּזִ֧י <S%H941><s%> of Buzi הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land כַּשְׂדִּ֖ים <S%H3778><s%> of the Chaldeans עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by נְהַר־ <S%H5104><s%> by the river כְּבָ֑ר <S%H3529><s%> Chebar וַתְּהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came עָלָ֛יו <S%H5921><s%> and שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> and there יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> and the hand יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וָאֵ֡רֶא <S%H7200><s%> And I looked וְהִנֵּה֩ <S%H2009><s%> behold ר֨וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> wind סְעָרָ֜ה <S%H5591><s%> A storm בָּאָ֣ה <S%H935><s%> came מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַצָּפ֗וֹן <S%H6828><s%> out of the north עָנָ֤ן <S%H6051><s%> cloud גָּדוֹל֙ <S%H1419><s%> a great וְאֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> and a fire מִתְלַקַּ֔חַת <S%H3947><s%> infolding וְנֹ֥גַֽהּ <S%H5051><s%> itself and a brightness ל֖וֹ סָבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> [was] about וּמִ֨תּוֹכָ֔הּ <S%H8432><s%> it and out of the midst כְּעֵ֥ין <S%H5869><s%> thereof as the colour הַחַשְׁמַ֖ל <S%H2830><s%> of amber מִתּ֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> out of the midst הָאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> of the fire

וּמִ֨תּוֹכָ֔הּ <S%H8432><s%> Also out of the midst דְּמ֖וּת <S%H1823><s%> thereof [came] the likeness אַרְבַּ֣ע <S%H702><s%> of four חַיּ֑וֹת <S%H2416><s%> living creatures וְזֶה֙ <S%H2088><s%> and this מַרְאֵֽיהֶ֔ן <S%H4758><s%> And this [was] their appearance דְּמ֥וּת <S%H1823><s%> had the likeness אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> of a man לָהֵֽנָּה׃ <S%H2007><s%> they

וְאַרְבָּעָ֥ה <S%H702><s%> had four פָנִ֖ים <S%H6440><s%> faces לְאֶחָ֑ת <S%H259><s%> And every one וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <S%H702><s%> had four כְּנָפַ֖יִם <S%H3671><s%> wings לְאַחַ֥ת <S%H259><s%> and every one לָהֶֽם׃

וְרַגְלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H7272><s%> And their feet רֶ֣גֶל <S%H7272><s%> feet יְשָׁרָ֑ה <S%H3477><s%> [were] straight וְכַ֣ף <S%H3709><s%> and the sole רַגְלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H7272><s%> of their feet כְּכַף֙ <S%H3709><s%> [was] like the sole רֶ֣גֶל <S%H7272><s%> foot עֵ֔גֶל <S%H5695><s%> of a calf's וְנֹ֣צְצִ֔ים <S%H5340><s%> and they sparkled כְּעֵ֖ין <S%H5869><s%> like the colour נְחֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> brass קָלָֽל׃ <S%H7044><s%> of burnished

[וְיָדֹו כ] (וִידֵ֣י <S%H3027><s%> able ק) אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> of a man מִתַּ֙חַת֙ <S%H8478><s%> Under כַּנְפֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H3671><s%> under their wings עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> on אַרְבַּ֣עַת <S%H702><s%> on their four רִבְעֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H7253><s%> sides וּפְנֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H6440><s%> had their faces וְכַנְפֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H3671><s%> and their wings לְאַרְבַּעְתָּֽם׃ <S%H702><s%> and they four

חֹֽבְרֹ֛ת <S%H2266><s%> [were] joined אִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H802><s%> one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֲחוֹתָ֖הּ <S%H269><s%> to another כַּנְפֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H3671><s%> Their wings לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not יִסַּ֣בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> they turned בְלֶכְתָּ֔ן <S%H1980><s%> moved אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עֵ֥בֶר <S%H5676><s%> straight פָּנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> forward יֵלֵֽכוּ׃ <S%H1980><s%> went

וּדְמ֣וּת <S%H1823><s%> As for the likeness פְּנֵיהֶם֮ <S%H6440><s%> of their faces פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> had the face אָדָם֒ <S%H120><s%> of a man וּפְנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> and the face אַרְיֵ֤ה <S%H738><s%> of a lion אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on הַיָּמִין֙ <S%H3225><s%> on the right side לְאַרְבַּעְתָּ֔ם <S%H702><s%> they four וּפְנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> had the face שׁ֥וֹר <S%H7794><s%> of an ox מֵֽהַשְּׂמֹ֖אול <S%H8040><s%> on the left side לְאַרְבַּעְתָּ֑ן <S%H702><s%> and they four וּפְנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> also had the face נֶ֖שֶׁר <S%H5404><s%> of an eagle לְאַרְבַּעְתָּֽן׃ <S%H702><s%> they four

וּפְנֵיהֶ֕ם <S%H6440><s%> Thus [were] their faces וְכַנְפֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H3671><s%> and their wings פְּרֻד֖וֹת <S%H6504><s%> [were] stretched מִלְמָ֑עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> upward לְאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> [wings] of every one שְׁ֚תַּיִם <S%H8147><s%> two חֹבְר֣וֹת <S%H2266><s%> [were] joined אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> one וּשְׁתַּ֣יִם <S%H8147><s%> and two מְכַסּ֔וֹת <S%H3680><s%> covered אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> גְּוִיֹתֵיהֶֽנָה׃ <S%H1472><s%> their bodies

וְאִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עֵ֥בֶר <S%H5676><s%> straight פָּנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> forward יֵלֵ֑כוּ <S%H1980><s%> went אֶ֣ל <S%H413><s%> about אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> after יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become שָׁ֨מָּה <S%H8033><s%> in it הָר֤וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> whither the spirit לָלֶ֙כֶת֙ <S%H1980><s%> to go יֵלֵ֔כוּ <S%H1980><s%> go לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> without יִסַּ֖בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> [and] they turned בְּלֶכְתָּֽן׃ <S%H1980><s%> went

וּדְמ֨וּת <S%H1823><s%> As for the likeness הַחַיּ֜וֹת <S%H2416><s%> of the living creatures מַרְאֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H4758><s%> their appearance כְּגַחֲלֵי־ <S%H1513><s%> coals אֵ֗שׁ <S%H784><s%> of fire בֹּֽעֲרוֹת֙ <S%H1197><s%> [was] like burning כְּמַרְאֵ֣ה <S%H4758><s%> [and] like the appearance הַלַּפִּדִ֔ים <S%H3940><s%> of lamps הִ֕יא <S%H1931><s%> he מִתְהַלֶּ֖כֶת <S%H1980><s%> it went up and down בֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> among הַחַיּ֑וֹת <S%H2416><s%> among the living creatures וְנֹ֣גַהּ <S%H5051><s%> was bright לָאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> and the fire וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> and out of the fire יוֹצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> went forth בָרָֽק׃ <S%H1300><s%> lightning

וְהַחַיּ֖וֹת <S%H2416><s%> And the living creatures רָצ֣וֹא <S%H7519><s%> ran וָשׁ֑וֹב <S%H7725><s%> and returned כְּמַרְאֵ֖ה <S%H4758><s%> as the appearance הַבָּזָֽק׃ <S%H965><s%> of a flash of lightning

וָאֵ֖רֶא <S%H7200><s%> Now as I beheld הַחַיּ֑וֹת <S%H2416><s%> the living creatures וְהִנֵּה֩ <S%H2009><s%> behold אוֹפַ֨ן <S%H212><s%> wheel אֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> behold one בָּאָ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the earth אֵ֥צֶל <S%H681><s%> by הַחַיּ֖וֹת <S%H2416><s%> the living creatures לְאַרְבַּ֥עַת <S%H702><s%> with his four פָּנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> faces

מַרְאֵ֨ה <S%H4758><s%> The appearance הָאוֹפַנִּ֤ים <S%H212><s%> of the wheels וּמַעֲשֵׂיהֶם֙ <S%H4639><s%> and their work כְּעֵ֣ין <S%H5869><s%> [was] like unto the colour תַּרְשִׁ֔ישׁ <S%H8658><s%> of a beryl וּדְמ֥וּת <S%H1823><s%> likeness אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> had one לְאַרְבַּעְתָּ֑ן <S%H702><s%> and they four וּמַרְאֵיהֶם֙ <S%H4758><s%> and their appearance וּמַ֣עֲשֵׂיהֶ֔ם <S%H4639><s%> and their work כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become הָאוֹפַ֖ן <S%H212><s%> [was] as it were a wheel בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the middle הָאוֹפָֽן׃ <S%H212><s%> of a wheel

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in אַרְבַּ֥עַת <S%H702><s%> upon their four רִבְעֵיהֶ֖ן <S%H7253><s%> sides בְּלֶכְתָּ֣ם <S%H1980><s%> moved יֵלֵ֑כוּ <S%H1980><s%> moved לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> without יִסַּ֖בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> [and] they turned בְּלֶכְתָּֽן׃ <S%H1980><s%> moved

וְגַ֨בֵּיהֶ֔ן <S%H1354><s%> As for their rings וְגֹ֥בַהּ <S%H1363><s%> they were so high לָהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> like וְיִרְאָ֣ה <S%H3374><s%> that they were dreadful לָהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> like וְגַבֹּתָ֗ם <S%H1354><s%> and their rings מְלֵאֹ֥ת <S%H4392><s%> [were] full עֵינַ֛יִם <S%H5869><s%> of eyes סָבִ֖יב <S%H5439><s%> round about לְאַרְבַּעְתָּֽן׃ <S%H702><s%> them four

וּבְלֶ֙כֶת֙ <S%H1980><s%> moved הַֽחַיּ֔וֹת <S%H2416><s%> And when the living creatures יֵלְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> moved הָאוֹפַנִּ֖ים <S%H212><s%> the wheels אֶצְלָ֑ם <S%H681><s%> by them וּבְהִנָּשֵׂ֤א <S%H5375><s%> were lifted up הַֽחַיּוֹת֙ <S%H2416><s%> and when the living creatures מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> from הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> from the earth יִנָּשְׂא֖וּ <S%H5375><s%> were lifted up הָאוֹפַנִּֽים׃ <S%H212><s%> the wheels

עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> and אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> after יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become שָּׁ֨ם <S%H8033><s%> direction הָר֤וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Whithersoever the spirit לָלֶ֙כֶת֙ <S%H1980><s%> to go יֵלֵ֔כוּ <S%H1980><s%> go שָׁ֥מָּה <S%H8033><s%> direction הָר֖וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> thither [was their] spirit לָלֶ֑כֶת <S%H1980><s%> to go וְהָאוֹפַנִּ֗ים <S%H212><s%> and the wheels יִנָּשְׂאוּ֙ <S%H5375><s%> were lifted up לְעֻמָּתָ֔ם <S%H5980><s%> over against כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for ר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> them for the spirit הַחַיָּ֖ה <S%H2416><s%> of the living creature בָּאוֹפַנִּֽים׃ <S%H212><s%> [was] in the wheels

בְּלֶכְתָּ֣ם <S%H1980><s%> went יֵלֵ֔כוּ <S%H1980><s%> went וּבְעָמְדָ֖ם <S%H5975><s%> and when those stood יַֽעֲמֹ֑דוּ <S%H5975><s%> [these] stood וּֽבְהִנָּשְׂאָ֞ם <S%H5375><s%> and when those were lifted up מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> from הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> from the earth יִנָּשְׂא֤וּ <S%H5375><s%> were lifted up הָאֽוֹפַנִּים֙ <S%H212><s%> the wheels לְעֻמָּתָ֔ם <S%H5980><s%> over against כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for ר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> them for the spirit הַחַיָּ֖ה <S%H2416><s%> of the living creature בָּאוֹפַנִּֽים׃ <S%H212><s%> [was] in the wheels

וּדְמ֞וּת <S%H1823><s%> And the likeness עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> now over רָאשֵׁ֤י <S%H7218><s%> upon the heads הַחַיָּה֙ <S%H2416><s%> of the living creature רָקִ֔יעַ <S%H7549><s%> of the firmament כְּעֵ֖ין <S%H5869><s%> [was] as the colour הַקֶּ֣רַח <S%H7140><s%> crystal הַנּוֹרָ֑א <S%H3372><s%> of the terrible נָט֥וּי <S%H5186><s%> stretched forth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> now over רָאשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <S%H7218><s%> over their heads מִלְמָֽעְלָה׃ <S%H4605><s%> above

וְתַ֙חַת֙ <S%H8478><s%> Under הָרָקִ֔יעַ <S%H7549><s%> And under the firmament כַּנְפֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H3671><s%> [were] their wings יְשָׁר֔וֹת <S%H3477><s%> straight אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> the one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward אֲחוֹתָ֑הּ <S%H269><s%> toward the other לְאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one שְׁתַּ֤יִם <S%H8147><s%> had two מְכַסּוֹת֙ <S%H3680><s%> which covered לָהֵ֔נָּה <S%H2007><s%> on this side וּלְאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and every one שְׁתַּ֤יִם <S%H8147><s%> had two מְכַסּוֹת֙ <S%H3680><s%> which covered לָהֵ֔נָּה <S%H2007><s%> on that side אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> גְּוִיֹּתֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1472><s%> their bodies

וָאֶשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> I heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the noise כַּנְפֵיהֶ֡ם <S%H3671><s%> of their wings כְּקוֹל֩ <S%H6963><s%> like the noise מַ֨יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters רַבִּ֤ים <S%H7227><s%> of great כְּקוֹל־ <S%H6963><s%> as the voice שַׁדַּי֙ <S%H7706><s%> of the Almighty בְּלֶכְתָּ֔ם <S%H1980><s%> went ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice הֲמֻלָּ֖ה <S%H1999><s%> of speech כְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> as the noise מַחֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4264><s%> of an host בְּעָמְדָ֖ם <S%H5975><s%> when they stood תְּרַפֶּ֥ינָה <S%H7503><s%> they let down כַנְפֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H3671><s%> their wings

וַיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> came ק֕וֹל <S%H6963><s%> And there was a voice מֵעַ֕ל <S%H5921><s%> above לָרָקִ֖יעַ <S%H7549><s%> from the firmament אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> that was עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over רֹאשָׁ֑ם <S%H7218><s%> that [was] over their heads בְּעָמְדָ֖ם <S%H5975><s%> when they stood תְּרַפֶּ֥ינָה <S%H7503><s%> [and] had let down כַנְפֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H3671><s%> their wings

וּמִמַּ֗עַל <S%H4605><s%> And above לָרָקִ֙יעַ֙ <S%H7549><s%> the firmament אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> that was עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over רֹאשָׁ֔ם <S%H7218><s%> that [was] over their heads כְּמַרְאֵ֥ה <S%H4758><s%> as the appearance אֶֽבֶן־ <S%H68><s%> stone סַפִּ֖יר <S%H5601><s%> of a sapphire דְּמ֣וּת <S%H1823><s%> [was] the likeness כִּסֵּ֑א <S%H3678><s%> of a throne וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> was over דְּמ֣וּת <S%H1823><s%> and upon the likeness הַכִּסֵּ֔א <S%H3678><s%> of the throne דְּמ֞וּת <S%H1823><s%> [was] the likeness כְּמַרְאֵ֥ה <S%H4758><s%> as the appearance אָדָ֛ם <S%H120><s%> of a man עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> was over מִלְמָֽעְלָה׃ <S%H4605><s%> above

וָאֵ֣רֶא ׀ <S%H7200><s%> And I saw כְּעֵ֣ין <S%H5869><s%> as the colour חַשְׁמַ֗ל <S%H2830><s%> of amber כְּמַרְאֵה־ <S%H4758><s%> as the appearance אֵ֤שׁ <S%H784><s%> of fire בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> within לָהּ֙ סָבִ֔יב <S%H5439><s%> round about מִמַּרְאֵ֥ה <S%H4758><s%> it from the appearance מָתְנָ֖יו <S%H4975><s%> of his loins וּלְמָ֑עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> even upward וּמִמַּרְאֵ֤ה <S%H4758><s%> and from the appearance מָתְנָיו֙ <S%H4975><s%> of his loins וּלְמַ֔טָּה <S%H4295><s%> even downward רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <S%H7200><s%> I saw כְּמַרְאֵה־ <S%H4758><s%> as it were the appearance אֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> of fire וְנֹ֥גַֽהּ <S%H5051><s%> and it had brightness ל֖וֹ סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> round about

כְּמַרְאֵ֣ה <S%H4758><s%> As the appearance הַקֶּ֡שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> of the bow אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> after יִֽהְיֶ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become בֶעָנָ֜ן <S%H6051><s%> that is in the cloud בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day הַגֶּ֗שֶׁם <S%H1653><s%> of rain כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> so מַרְאֵ֤ה <S%H4758><s%> so [was] the appearance הַנֹּ֙גַהּ֙ <S%H5051><s%> of the brightness סָבִ֔יב <S%H5439><s%> round about ה֕וּא <S%H1931><s%> Such מַרְאֵ֖ה <S%H4758><s%> This [was] the appearance דְּמ֣וּת <S%H1823><s%> of the likeness כְּבוֹד־ <S%H3519><s%> of the glory יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וָֽאֶרְאֶה֙ <S%H7200><s%> And when I saw וָאֶפֹּ֣ל <S%H5307><s%> [it] I fell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פָּנַ֔י <S%H6440><s%> upon my face וָאֶשְׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> and I heard ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> a voice מְדַבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> of one that spake ס
